ref: 11805 *vibadhyatē ʻ is fastened ʼ. 2. vibaddha -- ʻ fastened, constricted ʼ Suśr. [víbadhnāti ʻ fastens on either side ʼ RV., ʻ obstructs (the bowels) ʼ Car.; vibandha -- m. ʻ circular bandage ʼ Suśr., Pa. vibandha -- m. ʻ fetter ʼ. <-> √bandh]
H. bījhnā ʻ to be entangled, be smeared, stick ʼ.
